text: Arthur Joseph Goldberg (August 8, 1908January 19, 1990) was an American statesman and jurist. He served as the U.S. Secretary of Labor, Supreme Court Justice and Ambassador to the United Nations. In 1970, Goldberg ran for Governor of New York, but lost to Nelson Rockefeller.
